# 玩转ECS从入门到精通（进阶篇）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian
wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian
wanzhuan-ecs-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-jinjiepian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
